qrLoginCenter.title: QR Login center
qrLoginCenter.pageInfo: Log in using the QR code issued from the QR login center
qrLoginCenter.LoginInfo: You can only use QR login method with supported devices
centerHowTo: Please launch the VIRNECT app on your mobile device or smart glass.
Select [QR Login] on the login screen to run it.
Please hold over the QR code displayed on the QR login center screen.
You will be logged in when the QR code is recognized
loginHowTo: Please launch a VIRNECT product or service.
Please hold over the QR code displayed on the QR login center screen.
You will be logged in when the QR code is recognized
